apa adhishtanaya kara gatha yuthu wadagathma karuna wanne, prauda sinhalayawa sulak mulak nathi jathiyak bawata path kota sulu jathin idiriye dina niwatayin bawata path kirime siyum wuda, bhayanaka wuda kriyamarga siyallama haraha apa prauda jathiya ese niwata wimen pasuwa ee gana wilapa naganawata wada dan waha wahama mewani yojana prathikshepa kirimata me yahapalana aanduwata erehiwa udgoshana kara owun nerapa damimayi ee sadaha siyaluma sinhalayan eekabaddaye wirodhathawayata heta (sapthambar 5 da 2018 ) kolambaata ekwanna ….janathawa path kala aanduwa janathawata saha rata jathiyata karanne winashayak nam owun palawahara rata jathiya beraganima janathawage wagakimayi yuthukamayi ….

mema sangamaya mangin samanalayan ha salabayan sanrakshanaya wenuwen samanalayan ha salabayan pilibanda paryeshana sidu kirima, daththa ekathu kirima, samanalayan ha salabayan pilibanda adhyayanaya karana widyagnyayan saha aadhunikayan athara anthar sabandathawan godanangima, samanalayan ha salabayan pilibanda mahajanathawa danuwath kirima, samanalayan, salabayan ha bathkuran athulu poduwe krumin sanrakshanaya sandaha rajayata sahaya wima saha sangamayehi samajikayan me pilibandawa gambaurin adhyayanaya sandaha diri ganwima ha ee wenuwen awashya pahasukam laba dima sandaha kriyathmaka weyi.

wasara dekahamarakata agra ithihasaya thula naththala samarana prathama awasthawa meya we.naththala wenuwen pawathwena mema prawardhana kala simawedi agrahi janapriya kebab, biriyani, nan, thanduri harunu wita uthuru indiyanu aahara rasa samanga ekwu oonama ayekuge kamathima rasayata sarilana aakaraye aaharapana piliyela karayi.me wiwidha wu aahara warga athara tarki biriyani, tarki tikka, tarki kebab aadiya da weyi.

issara kale ekeka aya thama thamange wimukthiya labapu aakaraya danaganna kiyawannako 'theri gatha' ha 'thera gatha'..me gihigeyi siyalu duk uhulapu isidasiyage wimukthiya..sudusu kala nowarada-uwatanda kota siyalu elipatha langadi himihuge-pa soda geta gos bandili athiwa wetha yami-kossa kadapathasuwanda wilawun-ha andun gena,dassaka se hinda-samiya sarasami sanasabath pisa walan sodami-puthuta salakana mawaka semamada salakami samihutamese bandi ali-himihuta bala karana nithara nihathamana silwath mata -kopayeni ohu katha karanne.........mama wanda mawupiyan-ha siyalu nayanpawidiwa sath dinakin-thun widu ha sanasumada labimime gihi jiwithaye apamana situ sampath anubhawa kala sujathawage wimukthiya..handa redipili pata wisithuru -suwanda sandun ga mada angapalanda barana maldam bara -yeheliniyan piriwara kota kama bima kawili pewili -genwagena nikma geyin athulu wimi uyana thulata -sanahannata sitha kaya deka .........danna lada sandaham athi mama-pawidi wa anagarika wimi thun widu danimi wesesa-sasna sambudu nosis wuwakipali: theri gatha uputa ganim theri gi (matin wikramasinha) potheni.
